name: EntitiesTest
description: Unit tests for the Entities class, focusing on entity escaping and unescaping functionalities.

test_cases.name: escape
test_cases.description: Tests the entity escaping functionality with different output settings.

test_cases.name: escapeDefaults
test_cases.description: Tests the entity escaping functionality with default settings.

test_cases.name: escapedSupplementary
test_cases.description: Tests the entity escaping functionality for supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: unescapeMultiChars
test_cases.description: Tests the entity unescaping functionality for multi-character entities.

test_cases.name: xhtml
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of codepoint to name and name to codepoint mappings in XHTML mode.

test_cases.name: getByName
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of getting entities by their names.

test_cases.name: escapeSupplementaryCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests the entity escaping functionality for supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: notMissingMultis
test_cases.description: Tests the entity unescaping functionality for multi-character entities.

test_cases.name: notMissingSupplementals
test_cases.description: Tests the entity unescaping functionality for supplementary characters.

test_cases.name: unescape
test_cases.description: Tests the entity unescaping functionality.

test_cases.name: strictUnescape
test_cases.description: Tests the strict entity unescaping functionality.

test_cases.name: caseSensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the case sensitivity of entity escaping and unescaping.

test_cases.name: quoteReplacements
test_cases.description: Tests the entity unescaping functionality for quote replacements.

test_cases.name: letterDigitEntities
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing and output settings of letter and digit entities.

test_cases.name: noSpuriousDecodes
test_cases.description: Tests that no spurious decoding occurs in URLs.

test_cases.name: escapesGtInXmlAttributesButNotInHtml
test_cases.description: Tests the escaping of '>' in XML attributes versus HTML.

test_cases.name: controlCharactersAreEscaped
test_cases.description: Tests the escaping of control characters in both HTML and XML.

test_cases.name: escapeByClonedOutputSettings
test_cases.description: Tests the entity escaping functionality using cloned output settings.

test_cases.name: parseHtmlEncodedEmojiMultipoint
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of HTML encoded emoji with multiple points.

test_cases.name: parseHtmlEncodedEmoji
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of HTML encoded emoji.
